name: Unique Learning System
description: Comprehensive, standards-aligned curriculum designed specifically for students with moderate to severe disabilities. Provides differentiated instruction with interactive lessons, assessments, and data tracking.
features: Interactive lessons; Differentiated content; Standards alignment; Progress monitoring; Assessment tools; Data reporting
subjects: Reading/ELA; Math; Science; Social Studies; Life Skills

name: SIRAS Systems
description: IEP (Individualized Education Program) data management and special education compliance platform used by school districts to track student progress, manage case loads, and ensure regulatory compliance.
features: IEP creation & tracking; Progress monitoring; Case management; Compliance reporting; Data analytics; Parent communication

name: LessonPix Visual Schedules
description: Visual schedule creation tool that helps students with autism and special needs understand daily routines through picture-based schedules and social stories.
features: Visual schedules; Picture library; Customizable templates; Social stories; Routine building; Print capabilities
subjects: Special Education; Life Skills; Behavior Management

name: SymbolStix PRIME
description: Symbol-based learning platform with over 90,000 educational symbols designed to support literacy, communication, and curriculum access for diverse learners.
features: Symbol library (90,000+ symbols); Literacy support; Curriculum integration; Communication aids; Customizable materials; Multi-language support
subjects: Reading/ELA; Communication; Special Education; Life Skills

name: Boardmaker
description: Industry-leading symbol and communication software that helps create visual supports, communication boards, and educational materials for students with special needs.
features: Communication boards; Symbol library (80,000+ PCS symbols); Template creation; Visual supports; AAC tools; Print & digital formats
subjects: Communication; Special Education; AAC; Life Skills

name: Verbal Me
description: Speech-generating AAC and choice board app designed for nonverbal students with autism and communication difficulties, featuring over 100 prebuilt pages with customizable communication boards and voice output.
features: Voice output (boy/girl voices); 100+ prebuilt pages; Customizable buttons; Picture communication; Switch access; Offline capability

name: GoTalk NOW
description: Communication app that turns tablets and smartphones into powerful speech-generating devices with customizable communication pages and natural-sounding voices.
features: Speech generation; Customizable pages; Natural voices; Picture support; Easy navigation; Cloud sync
subjects: Communication; AAC; Special Education; Speech Therapy

name: Boom Cards
description: Interactive, self-checking digital task cards that engage students in fun, game-like learning activities across multiple subjects with instant feedback.
features: Self-checking activities; Interactive games; Progress tracking; Multi-device access; Teacher dashboard; Standards alignment
subjects: Math; Reading/ELA; Science; Social Studies; ESL; Special Education

name: Padlet
description: A collaborative digital bulletin board / virtual canvas for posting and organizing multimedia content (text, images, audio, video, links).
features: Post text, images, audio, video, links; Customizable layouts and templates; Privacy / permissions settings; Board transfer / duplication; Real-time collaboration

name: ParentSquare
description: A school-district communication and engagement platform for messaging, announcements, and parent/family interaction.
features: Two-way messaging; Mass notifications; Translations into 100+ languages; Document delivery (reports/forms); Calendars, RSVPs, forms; Social media integration

name: ClassDojo
description: A classroom communication, behavior tracking, and parent engagement app used by teachers, students, and families.
features: Teacher-family messaging (auto translation); Class Story (photos, videos, announcements); Behavior tracking/points/analytics; Student portfolios; Class-level tools (random groups, timers, noise monitor, etc.)
subjects: Classroom management; Parent communication; Behavior / student engagement

name: ABSI Social Stories
description: A free library of social stories and video narratives provided by Autism Behavior Services to support social skills learning.
features: Downloadable social stories; Video social story gallery; Topics include social situations & routines; Free access
subjects: Social skills; Autism support; Behavior management
